name: Avoid having variable with too long name (PHP)
description: This rule searches for all Sections with variables name that are too long. A name is considered too long if it has more than 20 characters.
output:
This report lists all artifacts with variables name that are too long.

This QR provides the following information:
Artifact full name.
rationale: Source code containing long variable name is difficult to read and therefore to maintain.
remediation: Modify the source code to reduce the number of artifacts with variables name that are too long.
sample:
<?php
class CastExample
{
   protected $unusuallyLongMemberName = -6; // VIOLATION - Field

   public function Test( array $aVeryLongArgumentsList ) { // VIOLATION - Formal parameter

      $localVariableLongName = -7; // VIOLATION - Local parameter

      for ($interestingIntegerIndex = 0; // VIOLATION - For loop variable
      $interestingIntegerIndex < 20;
      $interestingIntegerIndex++ )
      { 
         echo $interestingIntegerIndex, PHP_EOL; 
      }
   }

}

$obj = new CastExample();
$obj->Test(array(1));
?>
